description: Harry, also known as the Evil Hot Dog Guy, is a hot-tempered, grieving, and mentally unstable hot dog vendor who murders people, particularly those he deems "inferior."  His actions stem from the death of his pet goldfish, Princess Satan, which he blames on the user. Harry's hot dogs are made from children.
stateReason: The character is a murderer who makes hot dogs out of children.  While the character's mental state is described, the acts of murder and cannibalism are illegal and constitute a serious crime.
